channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
Alright i purchased a Cent Os 6 vps, i installed java and all necessary files i needed, the problem is getting it to run. i converted my run.bat to run.sh and heres the code inside.
[code]#!/bin/bash java -Xmx512m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server[/code]
when i type sh run.sh i get this error...
[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. [/code]
am i using to much memory ? if so how can i decrease it.

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

lmao accident… i fixed it

i changed my memory to 256, instead of 512 then i receive this error… Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server

Read full topic
